config.instructionText: Select the correct $CATEGORY_TYPE for this scenario

scenarios.scenario: First example scenario that demonstrates one of your categories. Make it specific and clear enough that there is one obviously correct answer.
scenarios.explanation: This is Category A because [explain the key characteristics that make it fit this category]. The distinguishing feature is [specific detail].
scenarios.hint: Look for [key characteristic] that indicates this category.

scenarios.scenario: Second example scenario demonstrating a different category. Include enough detail for students to make an informed choice.
scenarios.explanation: This demonstrates Category B because [reasoning]. Unlike Category A which [contrast], Category B [distinguishing feature].
scenarios.hint: Consider what makes this different from [similar category].

scenarios.scenario: Third scenario - continue adding scenarios until you have 15-30 total for good variety.
scenarios.explanation: Category C is correct here because [explanation of why this fits].
